Prebon smirked, it was unusual for the leaders to want to be retrained, but=
 not entirely unheard of. "If you can follow my orders without question or =
attempting to throw your rank around you are welcome to join in. BUT I insi=
st on having complete control of the group." Trainer units had control of t=
hier regiment during all training procedures, if a higher rank attempted to=
 take over he had the right to disregard the order and have the bot removed=
 from the training area. This prevented any bots who weren't ready for fiel=
d work from being removed to soon.

ed towards quarter's section and suddenly he said "I was thinking about you=
 told me about who make the history... I'm interested to train with you... =
" 

   

    CYBERWOLF4 <cyberwolf4@...> wrote: 

    "That will be=
 fine" replied Prebon, he was anxious to get his informationand get the tra=
ining sesions started. "You may send me the information in my quarters and =
I'll prepare for the trainees." He wasn't one to slack, he believed in lead=
ing by example, then the recruits have no excuses for being lazy. He'd leav=
e those expectations for the bookworm functioned bots.
